issue.title: [Crossbow] Reduce GitHub API query parallelism
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7868](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7868). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With 4 parallel queries we trigger github's abuse detection mechanism, need to reduce the maximum number of parallel builds to one https://ci.ursalabs.org/#/builders/99/builds/261

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7868?focusedCommentId=17038566) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6439
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6439>
